item.name: Front of men's Basic Tee in black.
item.imageAlt: Front of men's Basic Tee in black.
item.description: Here's a three tiered wire basket to clean up your countertop and elevate your storage space. Display a selection of fresh fruit to encourage healthy snacking: pile it high and watch it fly. Can also be used as a caddy for dinner time fixings. Gather up a nice display of baked buns or cupcakes and usher them off to the table with the handy carry ring at the top.
